name: Creational Chaos
description:
Features:

- A simulation of an ecosystem

- Online high scores

- Adaptive soundtrack reacts to gameplay phases

- Compatible with most web browsers, desktop and mobile

This game was made in 7 days for Brackey's Game Jam - "Let there be Chaos", I wrote a devlog alongside it to record the experience along the way, have a look at the bottom of this page if you like :) 

Gameplay has 3 phases:

Emergent gameplay will happen!
